entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
